Hi konrad. mazurkiewicz1@gmail. com,    I’ve already informed our software engineers to work on the fix.  Could you please specify which telemetry feature you need? Is it one that SimHub already supports but we currently don’t? We will prioritize adding support for such features.

Every option I choose in simhub on the gas pedal on the engine causes the
brake to be automatically activated, wtf!? how can I deal with it?


W dniu śr., 23 lip 2025 o 13:02 service@simsonn.com

Hi konrad. mazurkiewicz1@gmail. com,       Please take a photo of your brake pedal installation. In most cases, the bracket or other parts may be touching the brake sensor, causing it to shift significantly when vibrations occur and resulting in signal fluctuations.

Yes of course and the vibrations from the engine mounted on the brake pedal
have no effect on it at all, only the vibrations from the gas pedal are
transferred,
no kidding...




W dniu wt., 29 lip 2025 o 17:44 service@simsonn.com

Hi konrad. mazurkiewicz1@gmail. com,     I think the throttle’s preload force is too light, which may cause vibration to interfere with the signal. You can try increasing the throttle’s preload force. Also, make sure the throttle sensor wire does not touch the bottom metal sensor, as that could transmit vibrations to the silver metal sensor.
